price: Ampa sε Yεde kwan kyerε no maa Mose, na Yεmaa Israel mma no dii Nwoma no akonnwa.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰ وَأَوۡرَثۡنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-hudā wa-awrathnā banī is'rāīla al-kitāba
